name: SweepOut
overview: A flashy Minesweeper clone that requires a TCP/IP connection. Emulator users need to configure a fast CPU, some Fast RAM, Kickstart 2.0+ the and bdsocket.library emulation. The creator added a lot of elements to the standard Minesweeper experience: online leaderboards, a title screen with music, multiple scrolling ingame layers, explosion effects, and alarm sirens that go off when the bonus timer is about to run out.
